description: Outputs absolute value of an input number
fullDescription:
#Absolute 

It's a simple math node, that outputs absolute value an input number.

#Add 

Outputs a sum of two input numbers

description: Rounds a number to a minimal integer that is greater than the number
fullDescription:
#Ceil 

It's a simple math node, that round a number to a minimal integer. E.G. `2.36` will become `3`

description: Outputs a line of text to the board standard debug interface
fullDescription:
#Console-log 

It prints an input string into standard debug interface (serial)

#Constant-boolean 

It provides to set constant boolean value: true or false

#Constant-number 

It provides to set constant number value, it could be negative, positive or equal zero.

#Servo 

Has two inputs: 

*PORT (number)*
Board port number the servo is connected to.

*VAL (number)*
Desired servo angle or value in unit range [0.0, 1.0]. For standard servo 0.0 would be mapped to 0° and 1.0 would be 180°.

description: Drives a DC motor through H-Bridge IC such as L293 or L298.
fullDescription:
#Servo 

Has three inputs: 

*DIR (number)*
Board port to which the direction pin of the H-Bridge is connected.

*PWM (number)*
Board port to which the PWM (aka Enable) pin of the H-Bridge is connected. The port should be capable of producting PWM signal.

*SPD (number)*
Desired speed of the motor in [-1.0, 1.0] range. Negative values denote clockwise rotation, zero denotes full stop, positive values denote counterclockwise direction.

description: Reads Sharp infrared range meter GP2Y0A41SK0F (the one with 4…30 cm range).
fullDescription:
#gp2y0a41-range-meter 

Measured distance in meters. Trustworhy only for distances in [0.04, 0.30] meters range.

description: Reads temperature and humidity from a DHT11 sensor.
fullDescription:
#dht11-thermometer 

Returns last read temperature in °C and relative humidity in ragne [0.0, 1.0].

description: Drives a digital thermometer based on TMP36 IC
